Today, Dan and Jordan celebrate surviving the July 4th Civil War by breaking down a little episode of Project Camelot where our intrepid host interviews a half-Pleiadian. Tune in to hear collaborative writing masquerade as an interview, and stay to hear everything go horribly off the rails.

==Tidbits==

*Kerry is Sweary Kerry
*Eddie is bad at his story
*Eddie is racist as fuck, Kerry calls him out, Eddie doubles down
*There's a dragon - It's the super-volano under Yellowstone
*Kerry runs the show when Eddie can't hang
*Eddie was in the CIA, went to Vietnam for the Secret Service
*Eddie lost 11 days on a spaceship
